Package org.wildfly.security.ssl

Class ConfiguredSSLEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.net.ssl.SSLEngine
      • org.wildfly.security.ssl.AbstractDelegatingSSLEngine
        • org.wildfly.security.ssl.ConfiguredSSLEngine
  • final class ConfiguredSSLEngine
extends AbstractDelegatingSSLEngine
    An SSL engine which is pre-configured with a specific protocol and cipher suite selection.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd
